name: Crushed Pineapple Fruitcake
author: Carol
summary: This is a very good cake for Christmas. Do not double this recipe.  You don't need to age this cake.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice
directions: Line an angel food pan with parchment paper and brush with melted butter
Cream butter or margarine, and then beat in sugar
Beat in eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition
Mix in flour, baking powder, and salt
Stir in raisins, cherries, pineapple, and mixed peel
Cover bowl and let sit at room temperature, 8 hours to overnight
Bake at 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) for 2 1/2 hours with a pan of hot water placed on the lowest rack of your oven during baking
Brush warm cake with some melted butter
